testcase.name: CopyPaste
testcase.system-out: Test: Start  Test18 Scenario is as follows 1.Pushing 1GB zip File to Host Internal Memory via server folder named as Test1 2.Extracting zip file in Host internal memory 3.Copy Paste 1GB file (Test1) from host internal memory to uSD Card, Create a folder named Test2 in uSD Card, Copy paste 1GB Folder(Test1) From internal to external inside folder Test2 and Vice versa 4.Create folder name(New_Scenario in External memory, select folder name(Test2) from internal memory and perform cut paste operation from internla to external memory Setting up the appium desired capabilities  Launch Home Screen application and clear recent apps Pushing zip file to host internal memory Push file is successfull Launching file manager application to extract zip and perform copy paste, cut paste operation from internal memory to external memory click on browse option Select Internal storage Search for Test1 Folder Search for TestFile Folder Extracting Push zip file as Folder named Test1 Extracting Zip file 1GB File Extration completed Extracting Complete Launching file manager application Select Internal storage Select Test1 folder from Internal storage Select Copy option Select External Storage Select Paste option for copy paste Test1 folder from Internal to external storage Copy paste 1GB folder from Internal to external storage is successfull Creating folder Test2 In uSD card Select create folder option Name folder as Test2 Test2 folder created Switch Grid view mode from list view mode Select Test1 Folder from External storage Select copy option Select Test2 folder Copy paste Test1 folder inside Test2 folder Select Test2 folder from Internal storage Select Copy option Select Internal Storage Select Paste option for copy paste Test2 folder from External to Internal storage Pass: Test18 Pass for Copy paste operation from internal memory to external memory and vice versa scenario completed successfully Select Test2 Folder from Internal Storage Select Move option Select External Storage Creating Folder Name New_Scenario in External Storage and perform Cut paste operation from Internal to external storage click on create folder and create folder name folder name New_Scenario Select New_Scenario folder and Paste Test1 folder inside New_Scenario folder click move here option Pass: Test18 Pass for Cut paste Operation Successfully  Final Message: Pass Test18 pass for copy paste & cut paste operation Test: End

testcase.name: rearVideoRec
testcase.system-out: Test: Start  Test10 Scenario is as follows 1.Launch Camera application and start back camera video recording for all host applicable resolutions in uSD Card 2.Playback Highest resolution recorded video from USD Card, fast forward playback and pause video scenario 3.Playback copied videos from Test1 folder, fast forward and pause scenario 4.Move rear camera recorded videos from uSD card to Test10 folder in uSD card Setting up the appium desired capabilities  Clearing Recent Apps Launch Camera Application for rear camera video recording If change to uSD card pop-up exists select Cancel change to SD card element not found : org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException: An element could not be located on the page using the given search parameters. for 10 seconds Pass: Recorded Video play back and fast forward successfull  Calling DataMovementOperation() to move recorded rear camer videos to Test10 Folder launch file manager application select Started video playback Tap Somewhere on Screen for contents to visible on Screen Click fast forward button for 10 seconds video forward Tap Somewhere on Screen for contents to visible on Screen Click pause button to stop video Pass: 4K Video play back and fast forward is successful Select FHD 5.1 ( 1350 X 2560 ).webm file for video playback Started video playback Tap Somewhere on Screen for contents to visible on Screen Click fast forward button for 10 seconds video forward Click pause button to stop video Pass: FHD Video play back and fast forward is successful  Final Message: Pass Test10 Pass for Playing Copied Video files, recorded video file and fast forward video play back scenario and Data move operation Test: End
